languages.text: {n}Воин горестно рычит:{/n} "Зря. Они заслуживали более славной смерти. И саги их должны были звучать дольше. Лучше бы мне было в тот день умереть, а им — жить дальше и разить врагов во славу Всеотца".

{n}Ulfar growls mournfully.{/n} "It was. They deserved a more glorious death. And their sagas should have gone on longer. It would have been better for me to die that day and for them to live on to slay enemies for the glory of the Allfather."
languages.original_text: {n}Воин горестно рычит:{/n} "Зря. Они заслуживали более славной смерти. И саги их должны были звучать дольше. Лучше бы мне было в тот день умереть, а им — жить дальше и разить врагов во славу Всеотца".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar growls mournfully.{/n} "It was. They deserved a more glorious death. And their sagas should have gone on longer..."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法哀伤地咆哮着。{/n}“是啊，他们本该死得更加光荣，他们的史诗本该继续延续下去。如果那天死的人是我，如果他们能活下去，继续为了全父的荣耀屠戮敌人该有多好。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar growls mournfully.{/n} "It was. They deserved a more glorious death. And their sagas should have gone on longer. It would have been better for me to die that day and for them to live on to slay enemies for the glory of the Allfather."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法哀伤地咆哮着。{/n}“是啊，他们本该死得更加光荣，他们的史诗本该继续延续下去……”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar gruñe, apesadumbrado.{/n} «Lo fue. Merecían una muerte más gloriosa. Y sus sagas deberían haber sido más largas. Hubiera sido mejor que yo hubiera muerto ese día y que ellos siguieran luchando por la gloria del Padre de todas las cosas».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar growls mournfully.{/n} "It was. They deserved a more glorious death. And their sagas should have gone on longer. It would have been better for me to die that day and for them to live on to slay enemies for the glory of the Allfather."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar gruñe, apesadumbrado.{/n} «Lo fue. Merecían una muerte más gloriosa. Y sus sagas deberían haber sido más largas...».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは嘆くようにうなる。{/n}「そうだ。彼らにはもっと輝かしい死がふさわしい。そして彼らのサーガはもっと長く続くべきだった。俺があの日死んで、彼らが全知の父の栄光のために敵を倒して生き続けるほうがよかったのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar growls mournfully.{/n} "It was. They deserved a more glorious death. And their sagas should have gone on longer. It would have been better for me to die that day and for them to live on to slay enemies for the glory of the Allfather."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは嘆くようにうなる。{/n}「そうだ。彼らにはもっと輝かしい死がふさわしい。そして彼らのサーガはもっと長く続くべきだった。俺があの日死んで、彼らが全知の父の栄光のために敵を倒して生き続けるほうがよかったのだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar knurrt voller Trauer.{/n} "Ja. Sie hatten einen glorreicheren Tod verdient. Und ihre Sagas hätten noch länger andauern sollen. Es wäre besser gewesen, wäre ich an dem Tag gestorben und sie hätten weiterhin Feinde zum Ruhm des Allvaters erschlagen."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar growls mournfully.{/n} "It was. They deserved a more glorious death. And their sagas should have gone on longer. It would have been better for me to die that day and for them to live on to slay enemies for the glory of the Allfather."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar knurrt voller Trauer.{/n} "Ja. Sie hatten einen glorreicheren Tod verdient. Und ihre Sagen hätten noch länger andauern sollen ..."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un grognement lugubre s'échappe de la gorge d'Ulfar.{/n} « En effet. Ils méritaient une mort bien plus glorieuse et leurs sagas auraient dû se poursuivre. Il aurait été préférable que je meure ce jour-là et qu'ils survivent pour continuer à massacrer nos ennemis à la gloire du Père de Tous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar growls mournfully.{/n} "It was. They deserved a more glorious death. And their sagas should have gone on longer. It would have been better for me to die that day and for them to live on to slay enemies for the glory of the Allfather."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un grognement lugubre s'échappe de la gorge d'Ulfar.{/n} « En effet. Ils méritaient une mort bien plus glorieuse. Et leurs sagas auraient dû se poursuivre... »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar growls mournfully.{/n} "It was. They deserved a more glorious death. And their sagas should have gone on longer. It would have been better for me to die that day and for them to live on to slay enemies for the glory of the Allfather."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar kederle uluyor.{/n} "Haklısın. Daha şanlı bir ölümü hak ediyorlardı. Destanları daha uzun olmalıydı. O gün keşke ben ölseydim de onlar Yücebaba'nın şanı için düşman öldürmeye devam edebilselerdi."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar growls mournfully.{/n} "It was. They deserved a more glorious death. And their sagas should have gone on longer. It would have been better for me to die that day and for them to live on to slay enemies for the glory of the Allfather."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar kederle uluyor.{/n} "Haklısın. Daha şanlı bir ölümü hak ediyorlardı. Destanları daha uzun olmalıydı. O gün keşke ben ölseydim de onlar Yücebaba'nın şanı için düşmanları öldürmeye devam edebilselerdi."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
